definition: something that is produced or appears from a particular place
a movement of air, dust or water in a circle
a person who thinks that they are better than other people and who thinks and talks too much about themselves
the fact of somebody being injured or killed when electricity passes through their body
an aubergine (= a vegetable with shiny dark purple skin that is soft and white inside)
a word that is pronounced like another word but has a different spelling or meaning, for example plain, plane /pleɪn/
the furthest that you can see, where the sky seems to meet the land or the sea
the limit of your desires, knowledge or interests
likely to happen soon
the women or wives belonging to a rich man, especially in some Muslim societies in the past
the separate part of a traditional Muslim house where the women live
a group of female animals that share the same male for producing young
a person who tries to persuade people to take part in political protest
a place, person or thing that you get something from
a person, book or document that provides information, especially for study, a piece of written work or news
a person or thing that causes or provides something
the place where a river or stream starts
at the place or the point that something comes from or begins
a large piece of equipment for cooking food, containing an oven and gas or electric rings on top
not lucky; experiencing extreme bad luck
a humorous character in some traditional plays, who wears special brightly coloured clothes with a diamond pattern
using money, time, materials, etc. in a careless way
using more of something than is necessary; not saving or keeping something that could be used
spending a lot more money or using a lot more of something than you can afford or than is necessary
costing a lot more money than you can afford or is necessary
very extreme or impressive but not reasonable or practical
a person whose job is to find people with the necessary skills to work for particular companies and to persuade them to join those companies
a member of a people that collects the heads of the people they kill
an offensive word for somebody who has no religion or who does not follow one of one of the world’s main religions
somebody who you think lacks education or moral principles
used in some religions, especially in the past, to refer in a disapproving way to people who do not follow that religion
a person who holds religious beliefs that are not part of any of the world’s main religions
used in the past by Christians to describe a person who did not believe in Christianity
a plant that is used for making rope and cloth, and also to make the drug cannabis
a hole on a piece of clothing for a button to be put through
a flower that is worn in the buttonhole of a coat or jacket
very wrong and unfair
expected to do something or to become something
expected to happen soon
any or every; anything or everything
used when you are saying that it does not matter what somebody does or what happens, because the result will be the same
used in questions to express surprise or lack of understanding
used as a reply to tell somebody that you do not care what happens or that you are not interested in what they are talking about
used to say that you do not mind what you do, have, etc. and that anything is acceptable
or something of a similar type
used to warn somebody not to do something under any circumstances
used to agree to somebody’s suggestion because you do not want to argue
a written order to attend court as a witness to give evidence
a mixture of loud unpleasant sounds
a drug found in coffee and tea that makes you feel more active
legally responsible for paying the cost of something
likely to do something
likely to be affected by something
likely to be punished by law for something
having to do something by law
a person who tells lies
a fixed form of prayers and actions used in public worship in some religions, especially Christianity
the amount of light given out in a particular direction from a particular area
a Greek dish made from layers of aubergine and meat with cheese on top
a person, an animal or a thing that kills
something that is very difficult, very exciting or shows a lot of skill
a person who has killed somebody deliberately and illegally
a broad, heavy knife used as a cutting tool and as a weapon
relating to architecture and buildings
a poisonous substance found in some plants. There are many different alkaloids and some are used as the basis for drugs.
an arrangement of numbers, symbols, etc. in rows and columns, treated as a single quantity
the formal social, political, etc. situation from which a society or person grows and develops
a system of lines, roads, etc. that cross each other, forming a series of squares or shapes in between
a mould in which something is shaped
a group of electronic circuit elements arranged in rows and columns like a grid
a mass of rock in which minerals, precious stones, etc. are found in the ground
a road surface made of layers of broken stones, mixed with tar
a sea fish with blue-green bands on its body, that is used for food
being one of the letters of the alphabet, rather than a number or other symbol
an effect caused by hot air in deserts or on roads, that makes you think you can see something, such as water, which is not there
a hope or wish that you cannot make happen because it is not realistic
containing both letters and numbers
the act or process of changing something from one form, use or system to another
the process or experience of changing somebody's or your own religion or beliefs
a way of scoring extra points after scoring a try or a touchdown
a building or room that has been changed so that it can be used for a different purpose, especially for living in
tidy and in order; carefully done or arranged
liking to keep things tidy and in order; looking tidy or doing things in a tidy way
small, with an attractive shape or appearance
simple but clever
good; excellent
not mixed with water or anything else
not made weaker by having water added to it; not having been diluted
not mixed or combined with anything and therefore very strong
you use unadulterated to emphasize that something is complete or total
not mixed with other substances; not adulterated
a blue, brown or purple mark that appears on the skin after somebody has fallen, been hit, etc.
a mark on a fruit or vegetable where it is damaged
an injury to part of the body that does not break the skin
a child whose parents are dead
an event or medium where people can exchange opinions and ideas on a particular issue; a meeting organized for this purpose
a website or web page where users can put comments about a particular issue or topic and reply to other users' comments
(in ancient Rome) a public place where meetings were held
in the past
the exact opposite of something; the act of causing something not to exist or to become its opposite
the act of disagreeing with somebody/something or refusing to do something
the loud noise that you hear after a flash of lightning, during a storm
a loud noise like thunder
somebody looks very angry
to get the attention, success, etc. that somebody else was expecting, usually by saying or doing what they had intended to say or do
a person who has both European and African ancestors, especially a person who lives in the West Indies
a person whose ancestors were among the first Europeans who settled in the West Indies or South America, or one of the French or Spanish people who settled in the southern states of the US
a language formed when a mixture of a European language with a local language (especially an African language spoken by slaves in the West Indies) is spoken as a first language
a situation in which two languages or two forms of a language are used under different conditions in a community
a combination of two vowel sounds or vowel letters, for example the sounds /aɪ/ in pipe /paɪp/ or the letters ou in doubt
that can be used; in good enough condition to be used
a tall decorated container, especially one used for holding the ashes of a dead person
a large metal container with a tap, used for making and/or serving tea or coffee
a person who plays the violin
a person who plays the violin, especially to play folk music
a piece of very thin material, worn especially by women to protect or hide the face, or as part of a hat, etc.
a piece of cloth worn over the head and shoulders by nuns or Muslim women
something that stops you from learning the truth about a situation
a thin layer that stops you from seeing something
to become a nun
a person who has been trained in the science of animal medicine, whose job is to treat animals who are sick or injured
